Title: Annayum Rasoolum
Writer: Santosh Aechikkanam, Rajeev Ravi, G. Sethunath
Actors: Fahadh Faasil, Andrea Jeremiah, Sunny Wayne, Shine Tom Chacko
Plot: The story of how Rasool, a Muslim falls in love with a Christian girl, Anna and how her family's strong disapproval makes their relationship change for the worse.
